markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vanth's Weapon Execution](/Feats.aspx?ID=2360) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 30 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Vanth's Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2357)

</column>

---

You've trained in the finer points of dealing death. Whenever you critically hit using a [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76), [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74), [scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), or [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.
name: Vanth's Weapon Execution
